phrases: You did not think of that?
My spirit might not be able to hurt you, but this Double Crescent Halberd will!
Li Jing, I will take your life!
What a good son.
I could not have left the Bell of East Emperor so soon.
I owe you.
Once your life is given to me...
I would add 100,000 years of cultivation.
This is the day I avenge myself!
Everyone has betrayed me!
Even you betrayed me!
The day my spirit returns to my body
is the day I break out of the bell and torch the Eight Far Lands
with my crimson hellfire to destroy Heaven and Earth!
It is the crimson hellfire!
The Ghost Lord has returned!
- The Ghost Lord has returned! - The Ghost Lord has returned...
Jiu'er!
Your Lordship, what happened to the Little Princess?
Quickly!
Go to Kunlun Mountain to see Mo Yuan!
- Yes! - No, there is no time to lose!
Go to Qing Qiu!
Qing Qiu is the closest.
Bai Qian also knows how to seal Qing Cang.
Yes.
Tian Shu, obey my command!
Present!
Auntie...
The Crown Prince is still outside the Fox Den.
He has not moved an inch.
If you mention him again...
I will turn you back into your original form!
Why has the weather suddenly changed, Mi Gu?
Auntie...
I do not know.
Is he still outside my den?
Yes, Auntie.
He is still out there braving the sun and rain.
Lord Dong Hua...
If we both die here, not even the heavens could tear us apart.
As long as I am here, you will not die.
I will use my spirit to pin him down.
But without my powers, I could only hold him off for a while.
You have to go to your aunt and fourth uncle immediately.
No, I will not leave.
Do not disobey!
I am not!
I told you that I would live and die with you!
No one can!
I have used my life to protect all lives and sacrificed my marriage.
If I insist on my relationship with you
it would surely because ceaseless wars within the four seas.
All shall be in misery.
Neither of us will meet a peaceful end.
Bai Feng Jiu, you are not some common woman.
You are the future Queen of Qing Qiu!
Do not be absurd!
I am not!
Dong Hua, if you live and so will I.
If you die, so will I.
If you could fend off Qing Cang I would never hold you back.
At most, I would just kill myself if you die.
However, you are no match for him now.
You do not even have one tenth of his powers.
I cannot let you seek your own doom.
You cannot go to him!
Step aside!
Not unless you kill me!
Today, I will have all living beings buried with me.
None of you can get away!
Jiu'er!
Jiu'er... Jiu'er!
Auntie, take a look at him.
Just one glance will do.
I cannot take that step forward.
Star Lord of Destiny seeks audience with Auntie!
There is trouble in Ruoshui Riverbank!
What did you say?
There was a weird sighting at the bell.
Lord Dong Hua said only Auntie could seal Qing Cang.
Qing Cang broke the seal?
When I left, he was still sealed.
But it is just a matter of time now.
Mi Gu, send a message to Fourth Brother.
Get him to assist me in Ruoshui.
- Yes. - Qian Qian...
Protect Lord Dong Hua!
Earth Deity!
Not even High God Mo Yuan could defeat him.
We are just minor deities.
How can we tackle him?
I am the Earth Deity of this area.
Even if I am no match for him I still have to give it a try!
I will risk my life to stand up to him!
- Qing Cang! - Earth Deity!
I have been guarding you for 70,000 years!
Do not you dare dream of leaving this place to harm anyone!
Earth Deity!
- Auntie... - Step aside!
Si Yin, is that you?
Exactly!
Qing Cang, it is me.
Who knew that I have only sealed you for about 300 years
and you have broken out again?
I have been waiting for you and Mo Yuan!
It was you and your mentor who had me trapped for 70,000 years.
I will avenge myself today and take both your lives!
How arrogant!
What magical artifact is this?
Let go of me!
You cannot defeat Qing Cang with your cultivation.
Leave him to me.
You have transferred all your cultivation to my mentor so you cannot defeat him!
Take good care of her.
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua!
Untie me!
He is seeking his own doom!
Do not panic, High God.
This magical artifact is really weird.
I cannot undo it!
Get me Lord Dong Hua!
Lord Dong Hua has lost all his powers so he is even worse than me.
Lord Dong Hua?
Little Princess?
Qing Cang, if you want to pick a fight come out here!
Mo Yuan?
You have finally shown up.
Who are you?
You are not Mo Yuan!
I am the Crown Prince of the Celestial Tribe, Ye Hua!
What?
Qing Cang broke free again?
Our Ghost Lord has returned!
Kill them all and the world will be ours!
Do not you dare act so arrogantly, Ghost Tribe!
Fourth Brother!
- Ghost Lord! - Ye Hua!
Young man, I lost to you today but it is not a fair fight!
If I were not still affected by the severe injuries from 70,000 years ago
and damages to my spirit by my treacherous son
I would never have been defeated by you!
Ye Hua!
You were still defeated in the end.
Ye Hua lost so much of his cultivation, but he still defeated Qing Cang?
- Ghost Lord! - Ghost Lord...
Ye Hua!
Qing Cang, what have you done?
All I did was to make use of the past 70,000 years
to connect my life to the Bell of East Emperor.
Once I am dead...
The Bell of East Emperor will release the crimson hellfire.
it will have all of you killed and buried with me!
Ye Hua!
- Ye Hua! - Qian Qian!
- Qian Qian! - Ye Hua!
- Qian Qian, you cannot! - Get back here, Ye Hua!
Ye Hua!
Get back here!
- Ye Hua! -
You cannot go!
- Ye Hua! - Qian Qian!
Get back here, Ye Hua!
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua...
Do not cry.
I am all right.
This injury is not serious.
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua...
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua...
Ye Hua...
Are you trying to swallow your blood again?
You are still young.
It is all right to look weak.
Ye Hua...
Tell me the truth...
Are you going to die soon?
Ye Hua...
Mo Yuan has returned.
Stay with him.
He...
He will take good care of you.
He would be better than me.
I am not worried.
- No... - Qian Qian...
Qian Qian...
All along, I...
I have loved only you.
Do not...
Do not forget me.
Do not...
Do not...
Do not forget me...
No... Ye Hua!
You cannot die!
Hang in there, just hang in there!
I will take you to my mentor.
He will be able to save you, Ye Hua...
Ye Hua...
Do not die!
I am begging you!
You cannot die.
You cannot die...
If you die, I will go to Zhe Yan for that potion.
I will forget you!
I will live just fine all by myself!
I do not want to remember who you are.
Do you hear me?
That is good.
You...
Ye Hua...
Ye Hua!
No...
Ye Hua, open your eyes!
Ye Hua!
Ye Hua!
Heavenly Lord!
Qing Cang triggered the Bell of East Emperor
to cast crimson hellfire upon the realms.
The Crown Prince...
He used his spirit as an offering to the bell.
What?
You said that the Crown Prince...
How could that happen?
Did not Lord Dong Hua said that the seal would only be broken every 70,000 years?
The Crown Prince seemed to have known in advance.
Before he went to the Mortal Realm for his heavenly trial
he had Tian Shu guard the bell.
Little did we know that after he is left the Mortal Realm...
Le Xu! Le Xu!
Master, did you hear that bell chime?
It sounds so depressing and comes from Ruoshui River.
That is the Bell of East Emperor...
Master!
Could it be that Qing Cang is going to break free?
Master... you cannot go!
- Send me there instead! -
It is all over now.
Someone has offered his spirit to the Bell of East Emperor.
So what if the Bell of East Emperor is triggered?
So what if the deities of all realms are vanquished in flames?
At least, we would still be together.
How could you leave me?
Ye Hua...
How could you leave me all on my own?
Qian Qian is very stubborn.
If this goes on, she might die.
What should we do?
I do not know.
First it was her mentor and now her future husband.
Qian Qian is destined to go through the loss of her loved ones.
Exactly.
She was going to marry Ye Hua.
What should she do now?
High God.
We are acting on the orders of Heavenly Lord
to collect the Crown Prince's body.
Please let me know what we should do.
You should all head back.
I think she will sit here holding on to your Crown Prince
for all eternity on Ruoshui Riverbank.
Auntie...
Auntie, please do not be so hard on yourself?
The dead cannot be revived, Auntie!
You still have me and your brothers.
You still have the entire Qing Qiu, Auntie!
Auntie!
Auntie, do not behave like this.
You are scaring me.
Auntie!
Auntie!
How is she?
Your disciple is too emotional.
She cannot be consoled.
Seventeenth.
Master, you are here?
You must have a way to save Ye Hua, right?
You overcame the trial of the Bell of East Emperor.
You must be able to save him.
Seventeen...
Get Ye Hua a coffin so he can rest in peace.
Master, you cannot make such a joke...
I can wait.
70,000 years or even hundreds of thousands of years.
I can wait for him.
Master...
He already breathed his last breath.
When you offered your spirit to seal the bell
they also said that you were vanquished.
But I still managed to wait until you returned.
Ye Hua will also return.
He will surely return...
Even if you are to wait for him...
You should let him rest comfortably.
You cannot just keep sitting here.
Master, you are right.
Earlier... I promised Ye Hua...
I would take him back to Qing Qiu and lock him up in my Fox Den.
Then he could only look at me.
I will take him back to Qing Qiu now.
Head back there first.
- What is going on?
- Auntie!
- What should we do now?
- Exactly.
This is...
Lord Dong Hua...
Go on.
- What now? - How should we report back?
- How should we report back?
- Exactly...
What should we do now?
What are we to do?
Honorable deities, this is the home to generations of Qing Qiu's rulers.
Auntie now rules one of Qing Qiu's Five Far Lands as the Queen.
Although there are not as many regulations in Qiu Qing as in the Celestial Palace
the Queen's home is still not to be entered freely.
This is...
What should we do?
What are we to do now?
We do know that Auntie is the Queen of Qing Qiu
and that she is engaged to the Crown Prince.
However...
The Crown Prince is not just any immortal.
He is also the apparent heir of the Nine Heavens!
Now that the Heavenly Lord has sent us to bring him back, and yet Auntie...
Little Deity, this really puts us in a dilemma!
- Exactly. - Exactly!
Please try to talk Auntie around and hand over His Highness's body to us.
When Auntie went in, she already said that no one is to enter.
Please leave now.
This is...
Indeed...
We cannot report back!
It seems that Auntie would not give His Highness to us.
It is already been ten days.
I think that we would better report back to the Celestial Palace.
This...
Auntie, A-Li is still in the Celestial Palace.
Should we bring him back to Qing Qiu?
Do you not see that I am looking after Ye Hua?
I do not know how to talk you out of this.
High God.
Auntie has been behaving like this all day and night.
What if she wears herself out?
I will write you a prescription.
Make the decoction and trick her into taking it
so that she could get some sleep first.
I will get it done right away.
Su Jin.
As the guardian maid of the bell
you have failed in your duty to alert the Celestial Palace in time.
Ye Hua had no choice but to take on Qing Cang alone.
And he sacrificed his spirit to seal the Bell of East Emperor!
Do you know what you have done?
I did not want to cause them any trouble.
My cultivation is not of much use anyway.
For the sake of the Celestial Tribe
your clan still went ahead without any hesitation
even if they knew that they were to be sacrificed.
But you...
You are nothing like your parents.
I am totally disappointed in you.
Heavenly Lord, I beg you to spare me this once!
Please spare me this once, Heavenly Lord!
Guards!
Greetings to Heavenly Lord...
According to the celestial law, banish Su Jin from the Nine Heavens!
She is never to be given a celestial status for all eternity!
Take her away!
Yes...
High God Bai Qian is of a prestigious status.
The deities I sent over dare not offend her.
I wonder if Lord Dong Hua is willing to deign yourself to visit Qing Qiu
and assist my two sons in bringing Ye Hua back?
I was also at the battle of Ruoshui.
Back then...
Forget it.
Since Heavenly Lord said so I will accompany both princes there.
I am going with you.
Lord Dong Hua is already coming with us so you will not have to.
I am going to take a look at that Su Su or Bai Qian...
I will see what we have to do to make her return my son.
My poor son...
Is it ready?
I wonder if Zhe Yan's drug would work and put Auntie to sleep all day.
I am worried that should this continue
they might send celestial guards to snatch the Crown Prince back.
Who knows?
Who broke my celestial shield?
Feng Jiu greets Lord Dong Hua, Prince Yang Cuo
Prince Lian Song, and Consort Le Xu.
Could you inform her that we are here to retrieve Ye Hua?
Yes, please wait here, Lord Dong Hua.
I will inform Auntie right away.
Le Xu!
High God Bai Qian, I have come to you with an unfavorable request.
Although I know of your utter devotion to Ye Hua
the Heavenly Lord and his parents have not seen him since he passed away.
The Heavenly Lord favors his eldest grandson greatly.
Upon hearing the bad news he has been devastated.
It is been more than ten days.
And the old lord has yet to see the corpse of his grandson.
It is hardly justifiable.
So...
You are all here to take Ye Hua away?
Indeed.
Ye Hua's parents have already prepared a basalt crystal coffin.
They intend to take him back to the Celestial Tribe's
sacred Sea of the Innocence to be given offerings.
You cannot take him away.
He promised to have me take him to Qing Qiu.
Since I learned that you were that mortal, Su Su
I have been so worried.
This still happened in the end.
What sins had Ye Hua committed to have died twice for you?
When you were Su Su he devoted his heart and soul to you.
He would even give up being the Crown Prince.
As for your conflict with Su Jin
the Heavenly Lord made you compensate her with your eyes
and three months of lightning torment after you gave birth to A-Li.
You only gave her your eyes, but Ye Hua took the torment for you.
When you jumped off the Zhuxian Terrace
Ye Hua jumped in after you.
But that was your trial for godly ascension into high god.
What has that got to do with Ye Hua?
Ever since he met you, he has not had one peaceful day.
He did so much for you but what have you ever done for him?
You never did.
Yet you dare held on to him so defiantly!
Now that he is dead you would even hold on to his body!
I only have one question for you.
Bai Qian, who are you to do so?
That is enough.
My son slayed Qing Cang and sacrificed his spirit
to the Bell of East Emperor to stop it from engulfing the Nine Heavens.
He sacrificed himself for all lives in Heaven and Earth.
The Heavenly Lord has made his merits known to all.
Le Xu's opinion is but that of a woman.
High God, please do not take it to heart.
However, it is indeed inappropriate to keep my son's body with you.
Although my son is engaged to you the wedding was never held.
It is somehow unjustifiable for you to keep my son's body.
My son was the Crown Prince of the Celestial Tribe.
We have regulations in the Celestial Palace that cannot be broken.
Please allow us to take him back
to be buried in the Sea of Innocence on the 36th day.
High God, please grant us this wish.
